body_html: I just wrote a light-weight class to handle exactly this use case. It should be very easy to drop in. No Estimator necessary. I have a paper deadline end of this week. Early next week I'll move the code into a public repo and post a link in here.

body: I just wrote a light-weight class to handle exactly this use case.  It should be very easy to drop in.  No Estimator necessary.  I have a paper deadline end of this week.  Early next week I'll move the code into a public repo and post a link in here.
